title: The Perfectly-located 2 Bedroom Apartment of Your Dreams

provide a splash of pre-war Village charm for a cozy home to this stunning downtown abode.', 'Located in the heart of the East Village, it will take your social life to the next level.', 'Perfect for blossoming influencers, working professional, students and diplomats.', 'This gem of an apartment is perfect for chilling, entertaining, partying and filming videos of your awesome lifestyle.',
